snippet: On Feb. 6, 1952, Britain's King George VI died in his sleep at age 56.
abstract: On Feb. 6, 1952, Britain's King George VI died in his sleep at age 56.
lead_paragraph: On Feb. 6, 1952, Britain's King George VI died in his sleep at age 56. The Feb. 7 edition of The New York Times reported, "The mood of London today was one of sorrow for the sovereign who had served his country so well and who was no more."

headline.main: Feb. 6, 1952 | Britain's King George VI Dies
